WELCOME TO MYGYM

Welcome to MyGym, your ultimate fitness destination! At MyGym, we believe that fitness is not just a hobby, but a way of life. We are dedicated to helping individuals of all fitness levels achieve their health and wellness goals in a supportive and motivating environment.


Founded in 2016, MyGym has quickly become a leading fitness facility in Valdivia, Chile. Our state-of-the-art gym boasts an impressive range of equipment and amenities, designed to cater to the diverse needs of our members. Whether you are a beginner taking your first steps towards a healthier lifestyle or an experienced fitness enthusiast looking to take your workouts to the next level, we have everything you need to succeed.


Robert and Claire, marriage and MyGym co-founders


What sets MyGym apart is our team of highly skilled and passionate fitness professionals. Our certified trainers are committed to providing personalized attention and guidance, creating customized workout programs tailored to your specific goals and abilities. They are always ready to offer expert advice, motivate you during challenging workouts, and ensure you stay on track to achieve your desired results.

A SUPPORTIVE AND INCLUSIVE COMMUNITY

We understand that fitness is not just about physical exercise but also about creating a positive and inclusive community. At MyGym, you will find a welcoming atmosphere where individuals from all walks of life come together to pursue their fitness journeys. Our members form a supportive network, inspiring and motivating one another to push beyond their limits and celebrate their accomplishments.



In addition to our wide range of cutting-edge equipment, we offer a variety of group fitness classes that cater to different interests and preferences. From high-energy cardio sessions to strength training, yoga, and much more, our classes are led by experienced instructors who will challenge and inspire you to reach new heights.
